content.text: Hey how's your morning going?
Good! My girlfriend is having a baby shower today and I'm helping her prepare.
That's exciting! I just got home from work, it was a long one.
Oh no! I hope you're not too tired.
I'm okay. I'm a teacher and school is just starting back up.
Nice! I'm a fitness trainer, so I'm always on the go.
I see. My kids are grown, so I don't have to worry about that anymore.
I'm looking forward to being a dad! I'm sure it will be a lot of work but it will be worth it.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great dad.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to travel and take pictures. I also like to spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to tailgate for football games.
That's cool! I used to play football in college, so I always enjoy watching games.
That's awesome! I wish I had played football in college.
It was a lot of fun, but it was also a lot of hard work.
I'm sure it was.
So what are you looking forward to most about being a dad?
I'm looking forward to teaching my child about everything and watching them grow up.
That's going to be great! I'm sure you'll be a great dad.
Thanks! I'm going to try my best
